name: FruitsTower
description:
Fruits Tower is a brand new match-3 game!
The game rule is simple, tie the three or more same fruits create blasts! Try to create the new high score. Download it and get more tips!

How to play:
1. Tap the screen, stick is grow longer
2. Use the stick to tie the fruits
3. Matching 3 or more same fruits to make juicy smashing!

Once you start, maybe you do not wanna stop! Have a big fun!
